verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Also thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֧י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לְאַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> unto the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel קֵ֑ץ <S%H7093><s%> An end בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> is come הַקֵּ֔ץ <S%H7093><s%> the end עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [אַרְבַּעַת כ] (אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> four ק) כַּנְפ֥וֹת <S%H3671><s%> corners הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הַקֵּ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> Now [is] the end עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and I וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> [come] upon thee and I will send אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> mine anger בָּ֔ךְ וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H8199><s%> upon thee and will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> upon thee all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not spare עֵינִ֛י <S%H5869><s%> And mine eye עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> on וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <S%H2550><s%> thee neither will I have pity כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for דְרָכַ֜יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> but I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8441><s%> upon thee and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <S%H8432><s%> shall be in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> of thee and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> An evil אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> an only רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> evil הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בָאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> behold is come

קֵ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> An end בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> is come בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come הַקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> the end הֵקִ֣יץ <S%H6974><s%> it watcheth אֵלָ֑יִךְ <S%H413><s%> against הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> behold בָּאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> for thee behold it is come

בָּ֧אָה <S%H935><s%> is come הַצְּפִירָ֛ה <S%H6843><s%> The morning אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> unto thee O thou that dwellest הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> has come הָעֵ֗ת <S%H6256><s%> the time קָר֛וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day מְהוּמָ֖ה <S%H4103><s%> of trouble וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> rather הֵ֥ד <S%H1906><s%> and not the sounding again הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains

עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now מִקָּר֗וֹב <S%H7138><s%> Now will I shortly אֶשְׁפּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8210><s%> pour out חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> my fury עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> on וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <S%H3615><s%> upon thee and accomplish אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> mine anger בָּ֔ךְ וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H8199><s%> upon thee and I will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> thee for all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> And mine eye וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <S%H2550><s%> neither will I have pity כִּדְרָכַ֜יִךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee according to thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶתֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8441><s%> and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <S%H8432><s%> [that] are in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> of thee and ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD מַכֶּֽה׃ <S%H5221><s%> that smiteth

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Behold the day הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָאָ֑ה <S%H935><s%> behold it is come יָֽצְאָה֙ <S%H3318><s%> is gone forth הַצְּפִרָ֔ה <S%H6843><s%> the morning צָ֚ץ <S%H6692><s%> hath blossomed הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> the rod פָּרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> hath budded הַזָּדֽוֹן׃ <S%H2087><s%> pride

הֶחָמָ֥ס ׀ <S%H2555><s%> Violence קָ֖ם <S%H6965><s%> is risen up לְמַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> into a rod רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> None מֵהֶ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> of them none מֵהֲמוֹנָ֛ם <S%H1995><s%> none of them [shall remain] nor of their multitude וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> none מֶהֱמֵהֶ֖ם <S%H1991><s%> nor of any וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נֹ֥הַּ <S%H5089><s%> of theirs neither [shall there be] wailing בָּהֶֽם׃

בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> is come הָעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> The time הִגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> draweth near הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day הַקּוֹנֶה֙ <S%H7069><s%> let not the buyer אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor יִשְׂמָ֔ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoice וְהַמּוֹכֵ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> nor the seller אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor יִתְאַבָּ֑ל <S%H56><s%> mourn כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָר֖וֹן <S%H2740><s%> for wrath אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> is against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1995><s%> [is] upon all the multitude

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed הַמּוֹכֵ֗ר <S%H4376><s%> For the seller אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> regarding הַמִּמְכָּר֙ <S%H4465><s%> to that which is sold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall not return וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> long בַּחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> although they were yet alive חַיָּתָ֑ם <S%H2416><s%> of his life כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed חָז֤וֹן <S%H2377><s%> for the vision אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> regarding כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנָהּ֙ <S%H1995><s%> [is] touching the whole multitude לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָשׁ֔וּב <S%H7725><s%> thereof [which] shall not return וְאִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> neither shall any בַּעֲוֹנ֛וֹ <S%H5771><s%> himself in the iniquity חַיָּת֖וֹ <S%H2416><s%> age לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִתְחַזָּֽקוּ׃ <S%H2388><s%> strengthen

תָּקְע֤וּ <S%H8628><s%> They have blown בַתָּק֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H8619><s%> the trumpet וְהָכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> even to make all ready הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> everything וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> but none goeth לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חֲרוֹנִ֖י <S%H2740><s%> for my wrath אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> is against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1995><s%> [is] upon all the multitude

הַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword בַּח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> [is] without וְהַדֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and the pestilence וְהָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> and the famine מִבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> within אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> he that [is] in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בָּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> and he that [is] in the city רָעָ֥ב <S%H7458><s%> famine וָדֶ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and pestilence יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shall devour

וּפָֽלְטוּ֙ <S%H6403><s%> But they that escape פְּלִ֣יטֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6412><s%> of them shall escape וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> and shall be on the mountains כְּיוֹנֵ֧י <S%H3123><s%> like doves הַגֵּאָי֛וֹת <S%H1516><s%> of the valleys כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all הֹמ֑וֹת <S%H1993><s%> all of them mourning אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> for his iniquity

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַיָּדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> All hands תִּרְפֶּ֑ינָה <S%H7503><s%> shall be feeble וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בִּרְכַּ֖יִם <S%H1290><s%> and all knees תֵּלַ֥כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> will become מָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> [as] water

וְחָגְר֣וּ <S%H2296><s%> They shall also gird שַׂקִּ֔ים <S%H8242><s%> [themselves] with sackcloth וְכִסְּתָ֥ה <S%H3680><s%> shall cover אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> פַּלָּצ֑וּת <S%H6427><s%> and horror וְאֶ֤ל <S%H413><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פָּנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> [shall be] upon all faces בּוּשָׁ֔ה <S%H955><s%> them and shame וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H7218><s%> upon all their heads קָרְחָֽה׃ <S%H7144><s%> and baldness

כַּסְפָּ֞ם <S%H3701><s%> their silver בַּחוּצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> in the streets יַשְׁלִ֗יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> They shall cast וּזְהָבָם֮ <S%H2091><s%> and their gold לְנִדָּ֣ה <S%H5079><s%> shall be removed יִֽהְיֶה֒ <S%H1961><s%> will become כַּסְפָּ֨ם <S%H3701><s%> their silver וּזְהָבָ֜ם <S%H2091><s%> and their gold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> shall not be able לְהַצִּילָ֗ם <S%H5337><s%> to deliver בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> them in the day עֶבְרַ֣ת <S%H5678><s%> of the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נַפְשָׁם֙ <S%H5315><s%> their souls לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְשַׂבֵּ֔עוּ <S%H7646><s%> they shall not satisfy וּמֵעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4578><s%> their bowels לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יְמַלֵּ֑אוּ <S%H4390><s%> neither fill כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִכְשׁ֥וֹל <S%H4383><s%> because it is the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> has become

וּצְבִ֤י <S%H6643><s%> As for the beauty עֶדְיוֹ֙ <S%H5716><s%> of his ornament לְגָא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> it in majesty שָׂמָ֔הוּ <S%H7760><s%> he set וְצַלְמֵ֧י <S%H6754><s%> the images תוֹעֲבֹתָ֛ם <S%H8441><s%> of their abominations שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8251><s%> [and] of their detestable things עָ֣שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> but they made ב֑וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that נְתַתִּ֥יו <S%H5414><s%> therein therefore have I set לָהֶ֖ם לְנִדָּֽה׃ <S%H5079><s%> it far

וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> And I will give בְּיַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> it into the hands הַזָּרִים֙ <S%H2114><s%> of the strangers לָבַ֔ז <S%H957><s%> for a prey וּלְרִשְׁעֵ֥י <S%H7563><s%> and to the wicked הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְשָׁלָ֑ל <S%H7998><s%> for a spoil [וְחִלְּלֻהָ כ] (וְחִלְּלֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> begin ק)

וַהֲסִבּוֹתִ֤י <S%H5437><s%> will I turn פָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> My face מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> and they וְחִלְּל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> also from them and they shall pollute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צְפוּנִ֑י <S%H6845><s%> my secret וּבָאוּ־ <S%H935><s%> shall enter בָ֥הּ פָּרִיצִ֖ים <S%H6530><s%> [place] for the robbers וְחִלְּלֽוּהָ׃ <S%H2490><s%> into it and defile פ

עֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> Make הָֽרַתּ֑וֹק <S%H7569><s%> a chain כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the land מָֽלְאָה֙ <S%H4390><s%> is full מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> crimes דָּמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> of bloody וְהָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> is full חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> of violence

וְהֵֽבֵאתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> Wherefore I will bring רָעֵ֣י <S%H7451><s%> the worst גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וְיָרְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3423><s%> and they shall possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּֽתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> their houses וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <S%H7673><s%> to cease גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> I will also make the pomp עַזִּ֔ים <S%H5794><s%> of the strong וְנִחֲל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> will be profaned מְקַֽדְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> and their holy places
קְפָ֖דָה־ <S%H7089><s%> Destruction בָ֑א <S%H935><s%> cometh וּבִקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> and they shall seek שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וָאָֽיִן׃ <S%H369><s%> there

הֹוָ֤ה <S%H1943><s%> Mischief עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הֹוָה֙ <S%H1943><s%> upon mischief תָּב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come וּשְׁמֻעָ֥ה <S%H8052><s%> and rumour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> will be upon שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <S%H8052><s%> shall be upon rumour תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וּבִקְשׁ֤וּ <S%H1245><s%> then shall they seek חָזוֹן֙ <S%H2377><s%> a vision מִנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> of the prophet וְתוֹרָה֙ <S%H8451><s%> but the law תֹּאבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish מִכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> from the priest וְעֵצָ֖ה <S%H6098><s%> and counsel מִזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <S%H2205><s%> from the ancients

הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king יִתְאַבָּ֗ל <S%H56><s%> shall mourn וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> and the prince יִלְבַּ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> shall be clothed שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> with desolation וִידֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> and the hands עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land תִּבָּהַ֑לְנָה <S%H926><s%> shall be troubled מִדַּרְכָּ֞ם <S%H1870><s%> unto them after their way אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> I will do אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> וּבְמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4941><s%> and according to their deserts אֶשְׁפְּטֵ֔ם <S%H8199><s%> will I judge וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> them and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
